00240 
00241       // Array that holds all available group objects.
00242       DArray< Group<N> >     groups_;
00243 
00244       // Set of pointers to local groups.
00245       ArraySet< Group<N> >   groupSet_;
00246 
00247       // Stack of pointers to unused local Group objects.
00248       ArrayStack< Group<N> > reservoir_;
00249 
00250       // Array of pointers to groups, indexed by Id.
00251       // Elements corresponding to absent groups hold null pointers.
00252       DArray< Group<N>* >    groupPtrs_;
00253 
00254       // Pointer to space for a new local Group
00255       Group<N>* newPtr_;
00256 
00257       // Capacity for local groups on this processor.
00258       int capacity_;
00259 
00260       // Maximum number of groups on all processors, maximum id + 1
00261       int totalCapacity_;
00262 
00263       // Total number of distinct groups on all processors.
00264       int nTotal_;
00265

00267       * Allocate and initialize all private containers.

00269       void allocate();

00300       reservoir_(),

00314    /*
00315    * Read parameters and allocate memory.
00316    */
00317    template <int N>
00318    void GroupStorage<N>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00319    {
00320       read<int>(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00321       read<int>(in, "totalCapacity", totalCapacity_);
00322       allocate();
00323    }
00324 
00325    /*
00326    * Set parameters and allocate memory.
00327    */
00328    template <int N>
00329    void GroupStorage<N>::initialize(int capacity, int totalCapacity)
00330    {
00331       capacity_      = capacity;
00332       totalCapacity_ = totalCapacity;
00333       allocate();
00334    }
00335 
00336    /*
00337    * Allocate and initialize all containers (private).
00338    */
00339    template <int N>
00340    void GroupStorage<N>::allocate()
00341    {
00342       groups_.allocate(capacity_);
00343       reservoir_.allocate(capacity_);
00344       groupSet_.allocate(groups_);
00345       groupPtrs_.allocate(totalCapacity_);
00346 
00347       // Push all groups onto reservoir stack, in reverse order.
00348       for (int i = capacity_ - 1; i >=0; --i) {
00349           reservoir_.push(groups_[i]);
00350       }
00351 
00352       // Nullify all pointers in groupPtrs_ array.
00353       for (int i = 0; i < totalCapacity_; ++i) {
00354          groupPtrs_[i] = 0;
00355       }
00356 
00357    }
00358 
00359    // Local group mutators
00360 
00361    /*
00362    * Returns address for a new local Group.
00363    */ 
00364    template <int N>
00365    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::newPtr()
00366    {
00367       // Precondition
00368       if (newPtr_ != 0) 
00369          UTIL_THROW("Unregistered newPtr_ still active");
00370       newPtr_ = &reservoir_.pop();
00371       newPtr_->clear();
00372       return newPtr_;
00373    }
00374 
00375    /*
00376    * Pushes unused pointer back onto reservoir.
00377    */ 
00378    template <int N>
00379    void GroupStorage<N>::returnPtr()
00380    {
00381       // Preconditions
00382       if (newPtr_ == 0) 
00383          UTIL_THROW("No active newPtr_");
00384       newPtr_->setId(-1);
00385       reservoir_.push(*newPtr_);
00386       newPtr_ = 0;
00387    }
00388 
00389    /*
00390    * Register new local Group in internal data structures.
00391    */ 
00392    template <int N>
00393    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::add()
00394    {
00395 
00396       // Preconditions
00397       if (newPtr_ == 0) {
00398          UTIL_THROW("No active newPtr_");
00399       }
00400       int groupId = newPtr_->id();
00401       if (groupId < 0 || groupId >= totalCapacity_) {
00402          std::cout << "groupId = " << groupId << std::endl;
00403          UTIL_THROW("Invalid group id");
00404       }
00405       if (groupPtrs_[groupId] != 0) {
00406          UTIL_THROW("Group with specified id is already present");
00407       }
00408 
00409       // Add Group<N> object to container
00410       groupSet_.append(*newPtr_);
00411       groupPtrs_[groupId] = newPtr_;
00412 
00413       // Release newPtr_ for reuse.
00414       Group<N>* ptr = newPtr_;
00415       newPtr_ = 0;
00416 
00417       return ptr;
00418    }
00419 
00420    /*
00421    * Add a new Group with a specified id, return pointer to new Group.
00422    */
00423    template <int N>
00424    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::add(int id)
00425    {
00426       Group<N>* ptr = newPtr();
00427       ptr->setId(id);
00428       add();
00429       return ptr;
00430    }
00431 
00432    /*
00433    * Remove a specific local Group.
00434    */
00435    template <int N>
00436    void GroupStorage<N>::remove(Group<N>* groupPtr)
00437    {
00438       int groupId = groupPtr->id();
00439       if (groupId < 0 || groupId >= totalCapacity_) {
00440          std::cout << "Group id = " << groupId << std::endl;
00441          UTIL_THROW("Invalid group id, out of range");
00442       } else if (groupPtrs_[groupId] == 0) {
00443          UTIL_THROW("Group does not exist on this processor");
00444       }
00445       reservoir_.push(*groupPtr);
00446       groupSet_.remove(*groupPtr);
00447       groupPtrs_[groupId] = 0;
00448       groupPtr->setId(-1);
00449    }
00450

00453    /*
00454    * Return pointer to Group with specified id.
00455    */
00456    template <int N>
00457    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::find(int id) const
00458    {  return groupPtrs_[id]; }

00463    template <int N>
00464    void GroupStorage<N>::begin(GroupIterator<N>& iterator)
00465    {  groupSet_.begin(iterator); }

00468    * Set const iterator to beginning of the set of local groups.

00470    template <int N>
00471    void GroupStorage<N>::begin(ConstGroupIterator<N>& iterator) const
00472    {  groupSet_.begin(iterator); }

00474    /*
00475    * Check validity of this GroupStorage.
00476    *
00477    * Returns true if all is ok, or throws an Exception.
00478    */
00479    template <int N>
00480    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid()
00481    {
00482       
00483       if (size() + reservoir_.size() != capacity_) 
00484          UTIL_THROW("nGroup + reservoir size != local capacity"); 
00485 
00486       Group<N>* ptr;
00487       int       i, j;
00488       j = 0;
00489       for (i = 0; i < totalCapacity_ ; ++i) {
00490          ptr = groupPtrs_[i];
00491          if (ptr != 0) {
00492             ++j;
00493             if (ptr->id() != i) {
00494                UTIL_THROW("ptr->id() != i"); 
00495             }
00496          }
00497       }
00498 
00499       // Count local groups
00500       GroupIterator<N> iter;
00501       j = 0;
00502       for (begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00503          ++j;
00504          ptr = find(iter->id());
00505          if (ptr == 0)
00506             UTIL_THROW("Unable to find local group returned by iterator"); 
00507          if (ptr != iter.get())
00508             UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent find(iter->id()"); 
00509       }
00510       if (j != size())
00511          UTIL_THROW("Number from iterator != size()"); 
00512 
00513       return true;
00514    }
00515 
00519    template <int N>
00520    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00521    void GroupStorage<N>::computeNTotal(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00522    #else
00523    void GroupStorage<N>::computeNTotal()
00524    #endif
00525    {
00526       GroupIterator<N> iterator;
00527       Atom* atomPtr;
00528       int nLocal = 0;
00529       begin(iterator);
00530       for ( ; iterator.notEnd(); ++iterator) {
00531          atomPtr = iterator->atomPtr(0);
00532          if (atomPtr) {
00533             if (!atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00534                ++nLocal;
00535             }
00536          }
00537       }
00538       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00539       communicator.Reduce(&nLocal, &nTotal_, 1, 
00540                           MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, 0);
00541       if (communicator.Get_rank() !=0) {
00542          nTotal_ = -1;
00543       }
00544       #else
00545       nTotal_ = nLocal;
00546       #endif
00547    }
00548 
00549    /*
00550    * Check validity of all groups on this processor.
00551    */
00552    template <int N>
00553    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00554    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid(AtomStorage& atomStorage, MPI::Intracomm& communicator,
00555                                  bool hasGhosts)
00556    #else
00557    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid(AtomStorage& atomStorage, bool hasGhosts)
00558    #endif
00559    {
00560       int i;
00561       int atomId;
00562       int nAtom;  // Number of local atoms in particular group.
00563       int nGhost; // Number of local atoms in particular group.
00564       int nAtomGroup = 0; // Number of local atoms in all groups on processor
00565       Atom* atomPtr;
00566       ConstGroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00567 
00568       // Call simpler function that only checks storage data structures.
00569       isValid();
00570 
00571       // Loop over groups.
00572       begin(groupIter);
00573       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00574          nAtom = 0;
00575          nGhost = 0;
00576          for (i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00577             atomId  = groupIter->atomId(i);
00578             if (atomId < 0 || atomId >= atomStorage.totalAtomCapacity()) {
00579                UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id in Group");
00580             }
00581             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(i);
00582             if (atomPtr) {
00583                if (atomPtr != atomStorage.find(atomId)) {
00584                   UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent non-null atom pointer in Group");
00585                }
00586                if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00587                   ++nGhost;
00588                } else {
00589                   ++nAtom;
00590                }
00591             } else {
00592                atomPtr = atomStorage.find(atomId);
00593                if (atomPtr != 0) {
00594                   if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00595                      if (hasGhosts) {
00596                           UTIL_THROW("Missing ghost atom");
00597                      }
00598                   } else {
00599                      UTIL_THROW("Missing local atom");
00600                   }
00601                }
00602             }
00603          }
00604          if (nAtom == 0) {
00605             UTIL_THROW("Empty group");
00606          }
00607          if (hasGhosts && (nAtom + nGhost) < N) {
00608             UTIL_THROW("Incomplete group");
00609          }
00610          nAtomGroup += nAtom;
00611       }
00612 
00613       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00614       // Count & return number of local atoms in groups on all processors.
00615       int nAtomGroupTotal;
00616       const int source = 0;
00617       communicator.Reduce(&nAtomGroup, &nAtomGroupTotal, 1, 
00618                           MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, source);
00619       if (communicator.Get_rank() == source) {
00620          if (nTotal_ < 0) {
00621             UTIL_THROW("nTotal not set before isValid");
00622          }
00623          if (nAtomGroupTotal != nTotal_*N) {
00624             std::cout << "nAtomGroupTotal = " << nAtomGroupTotal << std::endl;
00625             std::cout << "nTotal*N        = " << nTotal_*N  << std::endl;
00626             UTIL_THROW("Discrepancy in number of local atoms in Group objects");
00627          }
00628       }
00629       #endif
00630 
00631       return true;
00632    }
00633 }
00634 #endif
